title: shtah
author: shtah
content: Meet Molie MessengerMolie.chat — is a multifunctional decentralized messenger that combines the capabilities of a classic messenger, a search engine, and a multi-currency crypto-wallet and PoS pool.Molie.chat — is a decentralized messenger platform that uses a combination of P2P encryption, Impleum blockchain technology, and the IPFS protocol for protection.Anyone can be a user of the Molie.chat messenger platform: ordinary or fictional people, companies, and even Internet sites.A group of users in the system — is a Company, without the need to register with government agencies. Intelligent (smart) contracts on the blockchain allow you to build, without intermediaries, direct, loyal relationships between users who themselves have entered into these smart contracts and immediately make payments on them in the Molie.chat system, with confidence in 100% execution and the possibility of complete anonymity.The Molie.chat messenger platform allows you to reach a larger audience, which, in turn, by communicating with each other, unites into a social network, creating a system in which they use various P2P services, anonymous offer and search, services for buying and selling cryptocurrency, escrow, accumulation, exchange for fiat money and vice versa.Multi-currency crypto wallet, allows you to pay for anything and anywhere, no one can block or track it.User data security using end-to-end encryption, fingerprint, facial recognition, and private key storage for crypto wallets.The unique bonus system and PoS cryptocurrency mining allow users to have additional income and increase the number of active users using their constant presence on the network. Voice and video calls, chats and channels,virtual and augmented reality in visual communication between users.Molie messenger — it is a multi-tasking unitary service for personal communication, receiving or providing services, and financial transactions.Components of Molie:Social — social network and anonymous search engine.Technological — blockchain, smart contracts, big data, machine learning of neural networks, virtual and augmented reality.Commercial — interest of users and prospects for the project's development as a whole for the cryptocurrency market.

comments.author: Rizzrack
comments.body: Haven't visited this board in a while...Sound interesting. Wanted to skim the "privacy policy" on the website and it downloaded it as a PDF . Call me crazy but I don't download PDFs. Can't you make it a pop-up modal or a new page ?

comments.body: Quote from: Rizzrack on July 31, 2022, 12:56:54 PMHaven't visited this board in a while...Sound interesting. Wanted to skim the "privacy policy" on the website and it downloaded it as a PDF . Call me crazy but I don't download PDFs. Can't you make it a pop-up modal or a new page ?
